name: The Green Maze (Android Version)
description:
NOTE: This version shows an on-screen joystick

ATTRIBUTION:

Tileset: "Orthographic Outdoor Tiles" by Buchn

Player Character: adapted from "Green Cap Character 16x18" by isaiah658

Fire sprite: adapted from "9 Frame Fire Animation 16x 32x 64x" by FoshyTakashi, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

Door: "Basic Door 32x32" by kungfu4000

Music 1: https://opengameart.org/content/keep-your-dream-alive-seamless-loop

Music 2: https://opengameart.org/content/fire-dream-psg-version

Win sound: "Win Sound Effect" by Listener

Game over sound: "8Bit Death Whirl" by Fupi
